meanings.sent1: The muddy dog befouls the clean carpet.
meanings.sent2: Please do not befoul the pristine waters of the lake with trash.
meanings.sent3: Accidentally spilling ink befouls the paper, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The graffiti artist befouls the blank wall with colorful designs.
meanings.sent5: The careless camper befouls the campsite by leaving garbage everywhere.

meanings.sent1: The factory's waste befouls the nearby river, harming the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to befoul the air with harmful pollutants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon befouls the picnic area by scattering food everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The corrupt politician befouls the reputation of the entire government.
meanings.sent5: The oil spill befouls the ocean, endangering marine life.
